name: sebastiaanluca/laravel-helpers
description: An extensive set of Laravel-specific helpers.

suggest.illuminate/database: Laravel framework database component. Required for the table reader helper.
suggest.kint-php/kint: A powerful and modern PHP debugging tool. Required for the debug helpers.
suggest.laravel/framework: The Laravel framework. Required for some global helpers and the form helpers.
suggest.laravelcollective/html: HTML and Form Builders for the Laravel Framework. Required for the form helpers.
suggest.laravelista/ekko: Ekko helps you mark currently active menu item in your navbar. Required for the active route helper function.
suggest.nesbot/carbon: A simple PHP API extension for DateTime. Required for the carbonize collection macro and global helper.
